duck: Median (geometry) - In geometry, a median of a triangle is a line segment joining a vertex to the midpoint of the opposing side.
Midpoint polygon - In geometry, the midpoint polygon of a polygon is the polygon whose vertices are the midpoints of the edges of.
midpoint definition: a point at or near the center or middle.
In geometry, the midpoint is the middle point of a line segment.

milestones: US fall foliage report: September 17
Swiss finish drilling world's longest overland tunnel

wiki.text:
In geometry, the 'midpoint' is the middle point of a line segment. It is
equidistant from both endpoints, and it is the centroid both of the segment and
of the endpoints. It bisects the segment.
wiki.title: midpoint
